JAname: 「スーパーアルティメット覇王魔剣」

upgrade.0: ATK increased by 12%. That's not all! The support from all Melusines you've helped in Merusea Village fills you with strength! Based on the number of them you've helped, your ATK is increased by up to an additional 12%.
upgrade.1: ATK increased by 15%. That's not all! The support from all Melusines you've helped in Merusea Village fills you with strength! Based on the number of them you've helped, your ATK is increased by up to an additional 15%.
upgrade.2: ATK increased by 18%. That's not all! The support from all Melusines you've helped in Merusea Village fills you with strength! Based on the number of them you've helped, your ATK is increased by up to an additional 18%.
upgrade.3: ATK increased by 21%. That's not all! The support from all Melusines you've helped in Merusea Village fills you with strength! Based on the number of them you've helped, your ATK is increased by up to an additional 21%.
upgrade.4: ATK increased by 24%. That's not all! The support from all Melusines you've helped in Merusea Village fills you with strength! Based on the number of them you've helped, your ATK is increased by up to an additional 24%.

upgrade.0: 攻击力提升12%。不仅如此！海沫村中曾蒙你帮助的美露莘们的声援心意充满了力量，依照她们的数目，攻击力至多进一步提升12%。
upgrade.1: 攻击力提升15%。不仅如此！海沫村中曾蒙你帮助的美露莘们的声援心意充满了力量，依照她们的数目，攻击力至多进一步提升15%。
upgrade.2: 攻击力提升18%。不仅如此！海沫村中曾蒙你帮助的美露莘们的声援心意充满了力量，依照她们的数目，攻击力至多进一步提升18%。
upgrade.3: 攻击力提升21%。不仅如此！海沫村中曾蒙你帮助的美露莘们的声援心意充满了力量，依照她们的数目，攻击力至多进一步提升21%。
upgrade.4: 攻击力提升24%。不仅如此！海沫村中曾蒙你帮助的美露莘们的声援心意充满了力量，依照她们的数目，攻击力至多进一步提升24%。

upgrade.0: 攻撃力+12%。それだけじゃない！メリュシー村であなたに助けられたメリュジーヌたちの声援が力を与え、満たしてくれる。助けた彼女たちの数を基に、攻撃力がさらに最大12%アップする。
